articles.title: B’day Wishes Pour in For Sonam Kapoor From Kareena, KJo, Janhvi - The Quint
articles.description: As Sonam Kapoor turned a year older, Bollywood celebrities took to social media to send love and warm wishes to the actor. From father Anil Kapoor to Anushka Sharma, many actors shared a special message.
